ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve seen them going from 10 to 100 plat, honestly.  Twenty plat is probably a fair price for one though.  See if you can get it for less though by going
ygData.messageBody:
Reedo wrote:

> From: "Reedo" <reedo@...>
>
> Ok you've all convinced me. Plus I got to actuall see one. But I need to
> know one thing. What is the right price to pay for a Dragoon Dirk? The
> best place to get them is Felwithe right? Its my understanding that they
> come from crushbone. Any help would be greatly appriciated.

I've seen them going from 10 to 100 plat, honestly. Twenty plat is probably a
fair price for one though. See if you can get it for less though by going
right to the source! I bet there are people camping Dvinn in Crushbone who
can't loot another one until they sell the one they're carrying, and would be
anxious to sell it quickly if someone had the cash.

Jyzan
